contentrichtext.text: {{For|the former Assistant United States Secretary of Defense|Colin R. McMillan}} {{Infobox boxer |name=Colin McMillan |realname=Colim McMillan |nickname=Sweet C |weight=[[Featherweight]] |nationality= [[United Kingdom|British]]| |birth_date={{Birth date and age|1966|2|12|df=y}} |death_date= |birth_place=[[London]], [[United Kingdom|UK]] |style=Orthodox |total=35 |wins=31 |KO=14 |losses=4 |draws=0 |no contests=0 |}} '''Colin McMillan''' (born 12 February 1966) is an [[England|English]] retired professional boxer. In a professional career spanning from 1988 to 1997, McMillan fought his way to the British Featherweight title in 1991 with a win over [[Gary De Roux]]. After successfully defending his British title, he added the Commonwealth title in 1992 before beating [[Maurizio Stecca]] for the [[World Boxing Organization|WBO]] Featherweight belt that same year. Known in fighting circles as '''Sweet C''', McMillan lost his WBO belt on his first defence, when he was unable to continue against [[Rubén Darío Palacios]] due to a dislocated shoulder.<ref>{{cite web | url=http://www.independent.co.uk/sport/the-interview-colin-mcmillan-sweet-c-turns-deal-maker-1122464.html | title=The interview Colin McMillan: Sweet C turns deal maker|author=Hubbard, Alan | work=The Independent | date=26 September 1999 | accessdate=24 February 2012}}</ref> ==References== {{Reflist}} ==External links== * {{boxrec|id=8876}} {{s-start}} {{s-sports}} {{Succession box| before={{flagicon|ITA}} [[Maurizio Stecca]] | title=[[WBO Featherweight Champion]]| after={{flagicon|COL}} [[Rubén Darío Palacios]]| years=16 February 1992–26 September 1992 }} {{s-end}} {{Persondata | NAME = McMillan, Colin | ALTERNATIVE NAMES = Sweet C | SHORT DESCRIPTION = British Boxer | DATE OF BIRTH = 12 February 1966 | PLACE OF BIRTH = [[London]], [[United Kingdom|UK]] | DATE OF DEATH = | PLACE OF DEATH = }} {{DEFAULTSORT:McMillan, Colin}} [[Category:English boxers]] [[Category:Featherweight boxers]] [[Category:World featherweight boxing champions]] [[Category:World Boxing Organization champions]] [[Category:Sportspeople from London]] [[Category:Living people]] [[Category:1966 births]] {{England-boxing-bio-stub}}
